mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RESERVATION WHERE reservation_status = 1 AND NOW() - INTERVAL 2 HOUR >= reservation_com;

SELECT c.user_idx , c.class_title , DATE_FORMAT(c.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS end_date FROM CLASS c WHERE DATE(c.end_date) = CURDATE() AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM NOTIFICATION n WHERE n.user_idx = c.user_idx AND n.user_notice_message LIKE CONCAT('%', c.class_title, '%마감%') )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM NOTIFICATION WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) > user_notice_created_at;
